blog.name: alle23212
blog.title: Alle.
blog.description:
librisognierealta.it è il mio blog.
Ho sempre sentito il bisogno di averne uno, ma non avevo mai trovato un argomento che mi spingesse a continuare a scrivere, finché non ho abbracciato la mia natura ossessia-compulsiva e assolutamente pignola! Da questo è nato il mio blog di recensioni e scleri di vario genere: Libri, Sogni e Realtà.

summary: Dal libro alla serie: Game of Thrones - Quinta stagione (parte 3/4)
title: Dal libro alla serie: Game of Thrones - Quinta stagione (parte 3/4)
body:
Dal libro alla serie: Game of Thrones - Quinta stagione (parte ¾) Siamo al penultimo appuntamento con le differenze della quinta stagione di Game of Thrones :) Oggi vediamo le puntate 6, 7 e 8

Dal libro alla serie: Game of Thrones –
Quinta stagione (Parte ¾)

Ci stiamo avvicinando alla fine di queste differenze, visto che la quinta stagione è l’ultima che corrisponde al romanzo. Come sappiamo Martin ha deciso che non ha più voglia di pubblicare il seguito della sua storia, quindi per vedere che cosa succede ci dobbiamo affidare solamente alla serie tv.

Così come nella quarta…

View On WordPress

title: Spot the difference...
body:
Aerys Targaryen 

Stannis Baratheon 

Cersei Lannister 

Daenerys Targaryen

Jon Snow

Some people burn other people alive as punishment and sacrifices… 

While some people protect others from getting burned….

Doesn’t matter what the reasons and circumstances are… burning people alive is wrong!

summary: I’ve never followed got pr before this upcoming season, but it seems to me that I keep seeing Sophie in the headlines (more so...
question: I’ve never followed got pr before this upcoming season, but it seems to me that I keep seeing Sophie in the headlines (more so than others save for maybe Kit). Is that usual or are they maybe gearing up the ga for Sansa’s more prominent role? Or maybe I’m just wrong and my eye just notices Sophie more lol
answer: Same. I do feel like she’s more prominent in the PR than she’s ever been and it’s all positive.

reblog.comment: Same. I do feel like she’s more prominent in the PR than she’s ever been and it’s all positive.

trail.content_raw: Same. I do feel like she’s more prominent in the PR than she’s ever been and it’s all positive.
trail.content: Same. I do feel like she’s more prominent in the PR than she’s ever been and it’s all positive.

summary: Can you relax a bit with Sansa? Not everyone has to feel the same way about her. Taking every single criticism of her you come...
question: Can you relax a bit with Sansa? Not everyone has to feel the same way about her. Taking every single criticism of her you come by and try to confute their point is only exhausting. Everyone has different takes on characters and not every criticism of Sansa is equivalent to Sansa hate. I really don’t try to be mean here, I’m just suggesting that you probably can’t change the opinions of people so why not spend your time and energy on your own opinions?
answer:
But I’m not. If I was, I’d jump on the posts and forced OP to debate me. Also I do have my opinions on Sansa and I state them all the time. 

Listen if you’re one of my followers or you see me in the Sansa tag, blacklist the tag or block me because it’s the last ever season, many people are preparing to slander Sansa and she’s one of my favourite characters ever. I’m going to be talking about her a lot.

reblog.comment:
